title: Radiant Diamond-Studded Kadas - Contemporary Challa Set
materials: G-H Color). Features durable Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional kada. These bangles feature a full eternity design, paved with shimmering diamonds. The design alternates between a single diamond accent and a clustered design for added brilliance and sophistication. The secure clasp ensures easy wear and removal. No traditional Nakshi work. Modern design.
occasions: and everyday elegance. Elevate your casual look or add a touch of sparkle to your wedding attire. Suitable for engagements
description: These diamond-studded kadas beautifully blend timeless elegance with modern design. The high-quality diamonds offer exceptional sparkle and fire. Their durability ensures they will be cherished for years to come. These kadas add a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
